Petit titre

Data set Airquality

```{r}
library(datasets)
data("airquality")
summary(airquality)
```

Les correlations entre features:

```{r}
pairs(airquality)
```

Linear model

```{r}
library(stats)
names(airquality)
fit <- lm(Ozone ~ Solar.R + Wind + Temp, data = airquality)
summary(fit)
```
